T05TD4018E:251b-19: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' bar chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa rtogs shing phyi rol gyi don du mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rdzogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba yang thob par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:252a-1: bdag med par ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4018E:252a-2: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pas skad cig 'jig cing thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' stong pa rang bzhin gnyis kyis kyang stong zhing bya ba dang byed pa po dang 'brel te /
T05TD4018E:252a-5: 'gog pa la sogs pa lhag pa'i chos dang bral ba mi gnyis pa skad cig ma'i rgyun du 'byung zhing brjod du med par gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:252a-6: skad cig pa dang skad cig pa ma yin par rtag na dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las /
T05TD4018E:252a-7: ji ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas par 'byung ba de ltar 'dir yang dgongs pa yongs su shes par bya ste /
T05TD4018E:252a-8: gzhan du na chos nyid dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:252a-9: de'i phyir dgongs pa bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4018E:252a-10: stong pa mi rtag skad cig par //
T05TD4018E:252a-11: 'dus byas la ni byis pa rtog /'bab chu mar me sa bon dpes //
T05TD4018E:252a-12: skad cig pa yi don du rtog / ces pa ste /
T05TD4018E:252a-13: 'bab chu dang sa bon la sogs pa gnyis kyi rnam pa can ni skye ba med pa ste /
T05TD4018E:252a-15: mig 'phrul la sogs pa bzhin du gzhan gyi dbang ni rnam pa sna tshogs nor ba'i rnam pa rnams ni med bas na der byis pa rnams kyis skad cig pa dang /
T05TD4018E:252a-16: skad cig pa ma yin par ci zhig rnam par rtog ces thams cad mkhyen pas dgongs pa'i don du brtag go //
T05TD4018E:252a-17: 'on te gzhan gyi dbang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa rnams la skye ba med na yongs su grub pa gzhan la skad cig pa dang /
T05TD4018E:252a-18: skad cig pa ma yin pa kho na ji ltar na yod par 'gyur zhes de skad du thugs dogs nas thams cad mkhyen pas bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4018E:252a-19: byed pa med cing skad cig pa //
T05TD4018E:252a-20: dben pa med pa spangs pa dang //
T05TD4018E:252a-21: chos rnams skye ba med pa ni //
T05TD4018E:252a-22: skad cig don du ngas bshad do //
T05TD4018E:252a-23: zhes bya ba ni yongs su grub pa la thams cad mkhyen pas don dam par skad cig tu 'jig par grub pa ste /
T05TD4018E:252a-24: gnyis su med pa'i yang dag par rig pa de la gnod pa med cing rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir na yod do //
T05TD4018E:252a-25: chos thams cad la ni byed pa med /
T05TD4018E:252a-26: byed pa gang gis kyang su yang mi byed de /
T05TD4018E:252b-0: nam skad cig pa gcig pa de ni skad cig pa gnyis po med na su zhig bya ba dang byed pa po dang @252b mngon par 'brel par 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:252b-1: ji ltar lung ston pa po rnams kyi byed pa po ni rang dbang can dang /
T05TD4018E:252b-2: bya ba 'dod pa'i gtso bo ni las dang /
T05TD4018E:252b-3: sgrub pa'i mchog ni bya ba la sogs par rtogs pa ni rgyun rtag par brtags te gnyis kyi rnam pa'i shes pa la 'dis byed do zhes ni rigs so //
T05TD4018E:252b-4: gang yang bya ba dang byed pa po gnyis las dben zhing mi gnyis pa de ni bya ba dang byed pa por 'byed pa'i byed pa dang bral bas na skye ba dang /
T05TD4018E:252b-6: 'gog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyi chos rnams skad cig pa la med do //
T05TD4018E:252b-7: bdag med pa gnyis la yang med de /
T05TD4018E:252b-9: des na chos rnams skye ba med pa ni skad cig pa'i don no zhes thams cad mkhyen pas dgongs pa'i don to //
T05TD4018E:252b-11: byung ba med ces seng ge'i sgra //
T05TD4018E:252b-12: de nyid sgrub par mdzad pas na //
T05TD4018E:252b-13: skyes ma thag tu 'jig par ni //
T05TD4018E:252b-14: byis pa rnams la nga mi 'chad //
T05TD4018E:252b-15: dngos po rnams ni rnam rtog pa //
T05TD4018E:252b-16: bar chad med par 'gro bar g-yo //
T05TD4018E:252b-18: skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i skad cig pa gcig gi rim thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis byis pa rnams la mi 'chad do //
T05TD4018E:252b-23: mi rtag pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du gnas pa la 'chad do zhes dgongs pa'i don du brtag go //
T05TD4018E:252b-24: sems ni 'byung bar byed pa yi //
T05TD4018E:252b-25: rgyu ni ma rig de yin te //
T05TD4018E:252b-26: ji srid gzugs dag mi shes pa //
T05TD4018E:252b-27: de srid bar du de gnas ci //
T05TD4018E:252b-28: zhes bya ba ni 'dis 'di byed do zhes byed pa por 'brel te dngos po rnams kyi rim gro ba rnam par rtog pas g-yo ba de ni sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa ste /
T05TD4018E:252b-29: byed pa por rang dbang can gyis gnas pa'i las byed do zhes byed pa dang /
T05TD4018E:252b-30: byed pa por rtog pa ste /
T05TD4018E:252b-31: de lta bur rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:252b-33: byed pa po la mngon par chags pa'i phyir 'khor bar gdags so //
T05TD4018E:252b-34: skad cig tu 'jig pa yongs su shes pas ni bdag tu chags pa med par 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:252b-35: bdag tu chags pa med na longs spyod kyi don du las mi byed do //
T05TD4018E:253a-0: sems rnams rnam pa sna tshogs su bslad pas bde ba @253a * //
T05TD4018E:253a-2: sdug bsngal du 'byed pas dbye ba na skad cig tu 'jig pa mngon sum du grub bo //
T05TD4018E:253a-4: gal te thams cad skad cig tu 'jig na dus gzhan du de nyid 'di yin no zhes par ji ltar na 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:253a-5: de ni 'dra ba'i skad cig pa gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir shes pa 'jug ste /
T05TD4018E:253a-6: skra dang rtsva la sogs pa bcad nas yang skye ba lta bu yin gyi se gol gyi sgra la sogs pa bzhin du 'dra ba'i skad cig pa gzhan mtshams sbyor ba med par thams cad skad cig pa ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:253a-7: de bzhin du skad cig pa dang /
T05TD4018E:253a-8: skad cig pa ma yin pa la dgongs te thams cad mkhyen pas mtshams sbyor gnas ston par mdzad pa /
T05TD4018E:253a-10: gser dang rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dang //
T05TD4018E:253a-11: 'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang //
T05TD4018E:253a-14: rgyus btab pa skad cig ma'i rgyun du bskal par 'khor bar yang gnas te /
T05TD4018E:253a-16: bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel dang /
T05TD4018E:253a-17: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T05TD4018E:253a-18: 'od snang ba'i gzhal med khang dang /
T05TD4018E:253a-19: 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i lus la sogs pa bskal pa'i gnas bstan no //
T05TD4018E:253a-20: kha cig ni skad cig pa gzhan du sdod pa med par skad cig pa de nyid la se gol gyi sgra la sogs pa lta bur rnam par 'jig go //
T05TD4018E:253a-21: gnas pa rnams dang thob pa'i chos //
T05TD4018E:253a-22: sangs rgyas ye shes phun sum tshogs //
T05TD4018E:253a-23: dge slong nyid dang shes thob rnams //
T05TD4018E:253a-24: skad cig mar ni ji ltar mthong //
T05TD4018E:253a-25: zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pas rgyun rtag pas rtag pa nyid du dgongs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:253a-26: gal te de dag rnams kyang skad cig pa gcig tu gnas su zin na ni de'i tshe 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba kho na dang /
T05TD4018E:253a-27: thams cad mkhyen pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa kho na dang dge slong ni dge slong ma yin pa kho na'i glags su 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:253a-28: gal te 'dri ba'i skad cig pa gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gyur na ni des na skad cig pa'i rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:253a-29: de'i phyir dgongs pas skad cig pa kho na ma yin la /
T05TD4018E:253a-30: mu stegs byed pa'i rgyu lta bur rtag pa'i dngos por yang ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:253b-0: @253b de ma skyes pas na mo gsham gyi bul sogs pa bzhin no //
T05TD4018E:253b-1: sgyu ma dri za'i grong la sogs //
T05TD4018E:253b-2: gzugs rnams ji ltar skad cig pa //
T05TD4018E:253b-3: 'byung ba ma yin gzugs rnams dang //
T05TD4018E:253b-4: 'byung ba de dag gang du song //
T05TD4018E:253b-5: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi don med pas 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs su snang ba rnams dri za'i grong khyer dang sgyu ma dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-6: rmi lam la sogs pa snang ba bzhin du gzhan gyi dbang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa ma skyes pas na der skad cig pa dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-7: skad cig pa ma yin pa kho nar ci yod /
T05TD4018E:253b-8: sngar bshad pa bzhin rig par bya'o //
T05TD4018E:253b-9: de de ltar chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pas rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-11: phyi rol gyi don du mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir mu stegs byed dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-12: nyan thos rnams las lhag par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byed cir byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba thob bo //
T05TD4018E:253b-13: btsun gtso'i byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor dam pa la /
T05TD4018E:253b-14: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs byed dang nyan thos kyi rnal 'byor la mchog chos dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-15: gang zag la bdag med pa rtogs pa'i phyir sa'i dbang po rnams rnal 'byor dam pa la rnal 'byor pa yin no //
T05TD4018E:253b-16: gang dmigs pa de nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug par sgom pa de ni tshul khrims te /
T05TD4018E:253b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi dngos po med pas mdzes pa dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-18: mi mdzes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa'i ngang tshul du byed de /
T05TD4018E:253b-19: nam shes rab kyis dpyad nas sbom po dang phra mo rnam par gzhigs te mi dmigs pa de na /
T05TD4018E:253b-20: gnyis su med pa yongs su shes pa de tshul khrims yin te /
T05TD4018E:253b-21: de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o //
T05TD4018E:253b-23: 'dzin pa yongs su shes nas rnam par rtog pa de ni mi 'jug par bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-24: gzung ba gnyis kyi rnam pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes nas rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o //
T05TD4018E:253b-25: brtson 'grus gang gis nam gyi cha stong dang /
T05TD4018E:253b-26: nam gyi cha smad la brtson par byed cing rnal 'byor dang mthun par mthong bas rnam par rtog pa ldog pa'i phyir /
T05TD4018E:253b-27: de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa ni nam shes rab kyis dpyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sbom po dang /
T05TD4018E:254a-2: mi dmigs pa de na rnam par rtog pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T05TD4018E:254a-3: gang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir mu stegs can gyi mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin par mi ltung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa yongs su shes pas rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:254a-4: bdag dang phyi rol gyi don rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir mu stegs can gyi mngon par chags par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i bsam gtan te /
T05TD4018E:254a-5: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T05TD4018E:254a-6: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T05TD4018E:254a-7: blo rab tu 'byed pa'i bar du rab tu phyen mtha' gnyis su mi ltung zhing gnas rab tu gyur pa mngon du 'gro ba mi 'jigs pas bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa thob par bya ba'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med par gyur pa ste /
T05TD4018E:254a-8: nam blo rab tu 'byed pa'i shes rab kyis dpyad de /
T05TD4018E:254a-9: phyi rol gyi don rab tu phye bas sbom po dang phra mo rnam par gzhig cing phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du mi ltung zhing mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa dang gzung ba'i shes pa'i log par gyur te /
T05TD4018E:254a-10: bsam pa med cing snang ba med pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:254a-11: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan ma med pa ste /
T05TD4018E:254a-16: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thog mar byas pa las rab tu phye ba ste /
T05TD4018E:254a-17: sa bcu'i dbang po rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i sa bcur 'byed pa rnams kyis snang ba dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:254a-18: snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du dbye bas phye ba na sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa'i phyir 'jug go //
T05TD4018E:254a-19: de ltar na des thams cad du khyab par gyur pa ste /
T05TD4018E:254a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpyad pa'o //
T05TD4018E:254a-21: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u drug pa las sa dang pha rol du phyin pa dpyad pa lnga pa'o /
T05TD4018E:254b-0: // / de nas yang bcom ldan @254b 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4018E:254b-1: sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can no zhes pa'o //
T05TD4018E:254b-2: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bcom pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar lung bstan zhes bya ba de la ci dgongs she na /
T05TD4018E:254b-3: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bas na 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni sangs rgyas su gdon mi za zhes so //
T05TD4018E:254b-4: thams cad mkhyen pas kyang bsam pa'i don la gsung par 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa bsal ba'i don du nyan thos rnams la sangs rgyas su de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar lung bstan to //
T05TD4018E:254b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs ma bshad ces bya ba der dgongs te gsungs pa'i don thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa ni ji bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos ston pa de bzhin du ngas kyang chos de kho na nyid bshad kyi /
T05TD4018E:254b-6: sngar med pa ni cung zad kyang ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:254b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lags te /
T05TD4018E:254b-8: mi rtog mi dpyod par 'phrul pa dag kyang sprul nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba mdzad de rnam par shes pa rnams kyang skad cig ma gcig nas gcig tu tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad /
T05TD4018E:254b-9: lag na rdo rje yang khor mor rtag tu zham 'bring du 'brang thog ma'i mthar mi 'dogs la mya ngan las 'das par 'dogs /
T05TD4018E:254b-10: bdud dang bdud kyi las rnams dang ;
T05TD4018E:254b-12: bram ze'i bu mo tsanytsa dang /
T05TD4018E:254b-13: mdzes ma kun du rgyu dang /
T05TD4018E:254b-14: lhung bzed bkrus bzhin pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa dag gda' na /
T05TD4018E:255a-0: bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nongs pa dag ma spangs par rnam pa thams cad @255a * //
T05TD4018E:255a-1: mkhyen pa nyid thob ces bya bar bstan pa de dag phan tshun du 'gal ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pas spangs par gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4018E:255a-2: blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T05TD4018E:255a-3: phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i dbyings la yang dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams kyang rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4018E:255a-4: blo gros chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dang /
T05TD4018E:255a-5: gzhan dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa yod de /
T05TD4018E:255a-6: de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa las bzlog par bya ba dang /
T05TD4018E:255a-7: theg pa chen po la rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir sprul pa'i nyan thos rnams la sprul pa'i sku dag gis lung bstan gyi /
T05TD4018E:255a-8: chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:255a-9: blo gros chen po de la dgongs nas nyan thos lung bstan to //
T05TD4018E:255a-10: blo gros chen po rnam par grol ba ro gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang /
T05TD4018E:255a-12: sangs rgyas rnams nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni bye brag med mod kyi zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:255a-14: mi mdzes par bsgoms pas rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:255a-17: gtsang bar phyin ci log las 'byung ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ste /
T05TD4018E:255a-18: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa ni byang chub gsum du yang bye brag med do //
T05TD4018E:255a-19: gang zag la bdag med pa yongs su shes pas ni nyon mongs pa spong ngo //
T05TD4018E:255a-20: chos la bdag med pa yongs su shes pas shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs te /
T05TD4018E:255a-21: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa de yang mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i bag chags dang bcas te spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa kho nar 'gyur ro ;
T05TD4018E:255a-22: / bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid bsgrub par mdzad pa shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:255a-23: blo gros chen po shes bya'i sgrib pa ni chos la bdag med pa mthong ba'i bye brag gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:255b-0: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog pa'i @255b phyir gang zag la bdag med pa mthong ba la bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas spong bar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:255b-1: chos kyi sgrib pa rnam par grol ba de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i bag chags bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par ngag par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:255b-2: sngon gyi chos kyi lus la dgongs te sngon dang phyis med pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir sngon bshad pa'i yi ge de dag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog mi dpyod par chos 'chad de /
T05TD4018E:255b-3: mkhyen bzhin du mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4018E:255b-4: dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /
T05TD4018E:255b-5: mi rtog mi dpyod do zhes pa ste /
T05TD4018E:255b-6: dran pa nyams pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi sku dang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku la bzhugs te rnal 'byor pa rnams la dngos po chos ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad mdzad do //
T05TD4018E:255b-7: bslad pa lta ba du mar ltung ba dang /
T05TD4018E:255b-8: nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams la sprul pa rnams kyis rtsod pa dang /
T05TD4018E:255b-11: bdud pham par byed cing thabs du mar chos ston to //
T05TD4018E:255b-12: nyan thos rnams la ni sangs rgyas su lung ston par mdzad do //
T05TD4018E:255b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo ni don dam pa pha'i tshul nyid ston to //
T05TD4018E:255b-14: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi ni shes rab dang thabs rnams kyis sems can rnams gzung ba'i phyir go rims kyis gang zag la bdag med par bstan nas phung po dang /
T05TD4018E:255b-15: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rab tu 'byed pas skad cig tu 'jig pa la zhugs pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i tshul la gzung par bya ba'i phyir snod du gyur pa rnams la chos la bdag med pa ston cing sems can gyi don rnam pa mang po mdzad do //
T05TD4018E:255b-16: sems can gang dag la bdud kyal ka byed pa'i rigs can gyis chos kyi bar chad byed pa de dag la btsun gtso 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje cha nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T05TD4018E:255b-17: sems can rnams skyo bar byed pa'i las kyi rgyud rab tu 'byed pa gsungs te /
T05TD4018E:255b-18: kye ma'o 'du byed rnams ni mi rtag go zhes rtog par longs spyod kyis mos pa kha cig yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:255b-19: kha cig ni rtag pa'i bdag tu mngon par chags pas skad cig tu 'jig pa thos te /
T05TD4018E:256a-0: bdag med pas skrag cing chos dang gang zag la bdag med pas don dam pa'i tshul la mi 'jug pa de dag la sems kyi skad cig ma @256a * //
T05TD4018E:256a-1: gcig tu rgyun rtag pas srid pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-2: thar pa'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-3: rnam par byang ba'i rgyu ston to //
T05TD4018E:256a-4: sems gcig po rtog go zhes byed pa por smra bar mngon par chags pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chud pa nyid spyi dang khyad par du dgongs te /
T05TD4018E:256a-5: sems can rnams la khyab pa dang rtag pa ston to //
T05TD4018E:256a-6: de de bzhin du thabs du mas sngags kyi rgyud dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-7: sprul pa gtong bar gsungs kyang gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang por gyur pa ston to //
T05TD4018E:256a-8: mos pa tha dad pa sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi thabs sna tshogs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T05TD4018E:256a-13: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-14: phug dang gzhal med khang dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-15: longs spyod rnam pa du ma sbyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang po rnams so //
T05TD4018E:256a-16: lhung bzed bkrus bzhin du slar ji ltar gshegs she na /
T05TD4018E:256a-17: de ni chos bcu pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T05TD4018E:256a-18: bsod nams chung zhing nyan thos rnams kyi yi chad pa bstsal ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:256a-19: de de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis sngags kyi tshul dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-20: cho 'phrul rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi snang bas spang bar nus kyang skur pa la btang snyoms mdzad pa ni bsod nams chung zhing skur pa mang ba'i sems can rnams kyi yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i don du tsanytsa dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-21: mdzes ma mu stegs kyis skur pa la btang snyoms mdzad do //
T05TD4018E:256a-22: lha sbyin gyis pha bong las yar te phog pa la btang snyoms su mdzad pa ni sems can mang pos sman byin pa'i bsod nams kyi don dang /
T05TD4018E:256a-23: de dus gzhan du skyo bar bya ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4018E:256a-24: chos bcu pa las log pa lha sbyin ni rnam par thar pa thob pa ste /
T05TD4018E:256a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa che ba kho nar mi dang lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams la sgrogs par byed do //
T05TD4018E:256a-27: chos dang dge 'dun la mi bden par byed pa de ni de lta bur sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ste /
T05TD4018E:256a-28: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
T05TD4018E:256b-0: dran pa mnyam pa med pa @256b dang ;
T05TD4018E:256b-1: / mi rtog mi dpyod pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-2: bag chags kyi sa bzhi spangs pa ste zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-3: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-4: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-5: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes par bag chags rnam bzhi yongs su smin pa ste /
T05TD4018E:256b-6: de dag tu bstan pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-7: mi bden pa'i bag chags ni dge ba dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-10: lung du mi ston par brtsams so //
T05TD4018E:256b-11: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bag chags ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las rab tu gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid me long gi ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:256b-12: 'pho ba gnyis dang bral ba ni 'khor ba'i 'pho ba dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-14: de dag bral ba ni 'pho ba gnyis dang bral bar brtag go //
T05TD4018E:256b-15: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-16: shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pas gang zag la bdag med pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-18: mi mdzes pa bsgom pas 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ngo //
T05TD4018E:256b-19: chos la bdag med pa yongs su shes pas shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ngo //
T05TD4018E:256b-20: blo gros chen po yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-21: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bdun rnams ni dge ba zag pa med pa'i phyogs dang bral ba ni 'khor ba ma yin te /
T05TD4018E:256b-22: bag chags kyi rgyu las 'byung ba'i phyir skad cig pa'o //
T05TD4018E:256b-23: blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor zhing mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T05TD4018E:256b-24: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin te zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa bdun rnams skad cig pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu las 'byung bas na 'khor bar mi 'khor ro //
T05TD4018E:256b-25: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rdo rje dang gser la sogs pa bzhin du skad cig ma'i rgyun rtag pa'i phyir 'khor ba ste /
T05TD4018E:256b-26: dus kyi khyad par du byed pa na dri ma dang bcas pa dang dri ma med pa dang /
T05TD4018E:257a-0: 'khor ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po @257a * //
T05TD4018E:257a-2: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir bden ba'i rgyu ste /
T05TD4018E:257a-3: bden pa shes pa la ni mi shes pa thams cad sdug bsngal lo //
T05TD4018E:257a-4: byis pa so so'i skye bos mi shes so zhes pa ni kha cig stong pa nyid kyis g-yengs pa'i blo can thams cad med ces pa ste /
T05TD4018E:257a-5: thams cad rtag par yong ces pa rtag pa'am chad par smra bar ltung zhing skad cig ma'i rgyun du rtag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po khong du chud par mi byed do //
T05TD4018E:257a-6: skad cig ma'i phyogs la g-yengs pas blo rtag tu chad pa'am rtag tu chad pa med par rtog go //
T05TD4018E:257a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni shes rab can rnams kyis shes te de ltar thams cad bsdu ba'i don du bshad nas yan lag gi don du cung zad cig bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4018E:257a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi sku gsum ni snang ba dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:257a-9: snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha dad pas rnam par 'byed do //
T05TD4018E:257a-10: ngo bo nyid kyi sku rnams ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T05TD4018E:257a-11: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul te /
T05TD4018E:257a-12: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang po thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa'o //
T05TD4018E:257a-13: bdud kyal ka can gyi rigs rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje de yongs su srung ba'i don du de zham 'bring du mi 'brang ngo //
T05TD4018E:257a-14: sprul pa rnams ni las las skyes pa'i ma yin te /
T05TD4018E:257a-15: de dag las ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan pa yang ma yin /
T05TD4018E:257a-16: gzhan pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T05TD4018E:257a-17: snang ba dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:257a-18: snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig por gyur te /
T05TD4018E:257a-20: des na gzhan pa dang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad mi rung ngo //
T05TD4018E:257a-22: phyis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i yi ge de dag nyid kyi snga mas bshad pa bzhin du thog ma dad tha mar dge ba 'chad kyi lhag par ni ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:257a-23: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi las las ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnams 'byung ba ste /
T05TD4018E:257a-24: sprul pa'i rnams ni ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:257b-0: @257b skye mched la sogs pa sprul pa rnams kyis ston gyi /
T05TD4018E:257b-1: ngo bo nyid rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:257b-2: rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni gnyis su med pa dang gnyis ka yang ngo //
T05TD4018E:257b-3: sprul pa rnams la nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la las kyi rgyu med de /
T05TD4018E:257b-4: de'i phyir lhung bzed bkrus bzhin la sogs pa'i lan ni thams cad mkhyen pa bdag nyid kyis /
T05TD4018E:257b-5: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs nas gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4018E:257b-6: sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi ched du las kyi rgyud bstan pas na sangs rgyas rnams chos ston pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po //
T05TD4018E:257b-7: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u drug pa las chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med par dpyad pa drug pa ste le'u drug pa rdzogs s+ho /
T05TD4018E:257b-9: // / de'i 'og tu bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad 'byung ste /
T05TD4018E:257b-10: de ni bdag gis dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las don dam yang dag 'phags kyis yongs su gsol ba'i 'og tu bshad pa ste /
T05TD4018E:257b-13: sems can gyi sems bsrung ba dang /
T05TD4018E:257b-14: snying rje bas snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpas sha bza' bar mi bya'o //
T05TD4018E:257b-15: mi gtsang ba bskos pas skyug bro ba'i gnas dang /
T05TD4018E:257b-16: pha ma'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po las byung ba dang /
T05TD4018E:257b-17: dri mi zhi ma zhing rma yod pa'i lus kyi sha ste /
T05TD4018E:257b-18: des na thams cad mi gtsang bas sha bza' bar mi bya'o //
T05TD4018E:257b-19: kha cig gis ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bar rtog par byed de /
T05TD4018E:257b-20: sder mo lnga pa lnga bza' ba //
T05TD4018E:257b-21: ri bong byi tur sbal dkar dang //
T05TD4018E:257b-22: bse dang rus sbal lnga pa ste //
T05TD4018E:257b-23: pha yi sbyin sreg pa sngo ba bzhin //
T05TD4018E:257b-25: gal te srog chags bsad ngo cog sdig par gyur na ni sha bza' ci dgos de la mchog sbyin pa rnams rtog pa ni mchod sbyin du bsad pa rnams ni bu dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:257b-26: khyu dang bcas par yang mtho ris su skye'o //
T05TD4018E:257b-28: lug dang ri dags bya rnams dang //
T05TD4018E:257b-29: bstan pa byin 'gro thams cad ni //
T05TD4018E:258a-3: zhes pa ni gal te don dam pa nyid rtsom na ni de dag la srog sdug pa nyid de /
T05TD4018E:258a-4: ji ltar drang srong byas sa smras pa /
T05TD4018E:258a-5: sems can gcig la mi 'jigs yod //
T05TD4018E:258a-6: sbyin pa de ni mchog yin gyi //
T05TD4018E:258a-7: bram ze stong gi grangs rnams la //
T05TD4018E:258a-8: ba stong gser dang bcas pa yi //
T05TD4018E:258a-9: gang gis gser gyi ri bo dang //
T05TD4018E:258a-10: rin chen bkang ste sa sbyin dang //
T05TD4018E:258a-11: de dang mnyam pa ma yin no //
T05TD4018E:258a-14: gzugs shing bcad de lug bsad nas //
T05TD4018E:258a-15: khrag gi rdzab tu byas nas ni //
T05TD4018E:258a-16: gal te de ltar mtho ris 'gro //
T05TD4018E:258a-19: mchod sbyin pa rnams rtog pa ni sngags kyis bsad pa la sdig par mi 'gyur ro zhes te /
T05TD4018E:258a-20: 'on mtshon gyis bsad pa la cis na sdig par 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:258a-21: de lta bas na snying rje can gyis srog gcod pa spong bar bya'o //
T05TD4018E:258a-22: legs par spyod pa la ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pas ji ltar na bdag gi don du rung /
T05TD4018E:258a-23: ji ltar drang srong bya sas smras pa /
T05TD4018E:258a-24: gang gis gang gi sha za ba //
T05TD4018E:258a-25: de dag gnyis kyi khyad par ltos //
T05TD4018E:258a-27: gcig ni gtan du srog dang bral //
T05TD4018E:258a-29: skyes bu la ni skye 'gyur ba //
T05TD4018E:258a-30: rjes su dpag pa de yis ni //
T05TD4018E:258a-31: gzhan yang bsrung bar rig pa'o //
T05TD4018E:258a-32: ksha pa na ka rnams kyis gsod pa ni /
T05TD4018E:258a-33: dam pa'i chos ma yin no zhes de skad ces pa de ni rung ngo //
T05TD4018E:258a-34: chos sems pa can rnams kyis ni dbang po rnams las 'byung ba'i 'o ma dang /
T05TD4018E:258a-36: dbang po las ma byung ba'i zan dang /
T05TD4018E:258a-37: skom ni bza' bar bya'o zhes btsog pa dang /
T05TD4018E:258a-38: gtsang ba rnam par rtog par byed do //
T05TD4018E:258a-39: de de ltar btsog pa dang gtsang bar rnam par rtog pa'i chu yang btung ba mi rigs te /
T05TD4018E:258a-41: nya dang rus sbal sems can mang po dang /
T05TD4018E:258a-43: rnag dang khrag la sogs pa rul pa rnams kyis rnyog pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4018E:258a-44: khar son pa'i zas kyang ldad pa na mchu sgo'i mtshams su tshud cing so'i dri ma pags pa dang /
T05TD4018E:258a-45: mchil mas dkris pa na kha zas kyang mi bza'o //
T05TD4018E:258a-46: lus thams cad kyang btsog pa yin no //
T05TD4018E:258a-47: ji ltar kha cig gis smras pa /
T05TD4018E:258b-0: zas dang de bzhin @258b bshang ba dang //
T05TD4018E:258b-2: bkru ba lus la gnas pas na //
T05TD4018E:258b-3: mkhas pa rnams kyis mi gtsang rig / ces so //
T05TD4018E:258b-4: dge slong skye bo gzhan dag 'o ma dang shas pho mtshan rgyags par byed cing /
T05TD4018E:258b-5: sbyar bar byed pa'i kha zas rnams yongs su spong ngo zhes rnam par rtog na lus ma bsgoms pa rnams la yang sran ma sha dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-8: nas rjen gyi phye la sogs pas pho mtshan cher rgyags par byed do //
T05TD4018E:258b-9: de de ltar na btsog pa dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-10: gtsang ba rnam par rtog pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa yin pas rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyis yongs su spang par bya'o //
T05TD4018E:258b-15: 'bru rgod zas ni bdag tu chags pa zlog par byed pa yang ma yin pa zhi bar byed pa yang ma yin pas chos bsam pa can rnams btsog pa dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-16: gtsang ba rnam par rtog pa 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'o //
T05TD4018E:258b-17: de dag gi so so'i gtso bo ni 'byung ba'i mthar phyin pa la sogs par klog go //
T05TD4018E:258b-18: bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas su ni rnam par gzigs //
T05TD4018E:258b-21: log par dad sel la sogs pa de dag bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas su rjes su dpag go //
T05TD4018E:258b-26: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-28: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa de lta bu dag la drang srong kha cig bzhugs nas de dag la byed pa dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-29: phrogs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par brtag go //
T05TD4018E:258b-31: dbyu gu can la sogs pas sbrang rtsi dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-32: sha ni rang bzhin gyis sdig pa'i rgyu'o zhes rtog par byed na /
T05TD4018E:258b-33: de dag gi kha zas gzhan 'bras chan dang /
T05TD4018E:258b-34: sran ma sngon po la sogs pa cis ni sdig pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur te ;
T05TD4018E:258b-35: / de bas na srog bcad pa yongs su spangs shing kha zas thams cad la ro'i sred pa yongs su spang ngo //
T05TD4018E:258b-36: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las /
T05TD4018E:258b-37: mkhas pa blo can mdzangs rnams kyis //
T05TD4018E:258b-38: zas gtsang bzang po cung zad bza' //
T05TD4018E:259a-3: des na 'o ma dang sha la sogs pa spangs pa 'ba' zhig las thar par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
T05TD4018E:259a-4: yul thams cad yongs su spang na thar par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:259a-5: gzhan dag ni sha za ba la nyes pa med de /
T05TD4018E:259a-6: chang la med cing 'khrig la'ang med //
T05TD4018E:259a-9: zhes pa ni bzlog pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar ba ni 'bras bu che bar yang rung ngo //
T05TD4018E:259a-10: 'jug pa ni bdag tu chags pa las te /
T05TD4018E:259a-11: sha la sogs pa'i yul du sred pas 'khrul pa rnams la 'khor bar sdug bsngal 'brel par 'gyur ba ni phye ma leb mar me la sogs par lhung ba bzhin no //
T05TD4018E:259a-12: der tshad ma ni gang dang gang 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brel par 'jug pa de dang de ni bdag tu chags shing bslad pa thog mar byas pa las 'byung ste /
T05TD4018E:259a-13: me la phye ma leb la sogs pa bzhin no //
T05TD4018E:259a-22: 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4018E:259a-23: de'i phyir bdag tu chags pa dang /
T05TD4018E:259a-25: gzhan la gnod pa la sogs pa ni sred pa la rjes su dpag go //
T05TD4018E:259a-26: gal te log pa'i shes pa'i bya ba ma gtogs par sdug bsngal rjes su 'bral bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe dben pa'i ye shes skyes su zin yang ngam grog la sogs pa yul spong bzhin de nyid du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:259a-27: de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa'i tshad ma'o //
T05TD4018E:259a-28: gzhan dag gis 'bru la sogs pa la srog tu kun brtags pa'i slong ba la sbyin pa yang sdig par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:259a-29: de ci'i phyir bdag tu chags pa'i log pa'i shes pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
T05TD4018E:259a-30: bdag med pa shes pas 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzlog go //
T05TD4018E:259a-34: mi za ba la sogs pa mi dgos so //
T05TD4018E:259a-35: cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T05TD4018E:259a-40: ri dags kyi brtul zhugs dang /
T05TD4018E:259b-0: zan mi za ba la @259b sogs pa sbyin sreg la sogs pa yang rung ste /
T05TD4018E:259b-1: gang gis 'dod chags las skyo ba thar bar 'gyur ba bdag tu sred pa las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4018E:259b-3: gser la sogs pa rku ba dang //
T05TD4018E:259b-4: ba lang sha yang za ba dang //
T05TD4018E:259b-5: bram ze stong yang bsad pas kyang //
T05TD4018E:259b-6: yang dag rig na mi gos so //
T05TD4018E:259b-7: yod pa rnams ni byas pa dang //
T05TD4018E:259b-8: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten bsad //
T05TD4018E:259b-9: chang 'thung la sogs nyes pa yis //
T05TD4018E:259b-10: yang dag rig pa la mi gos //
T05TD4018E:259b-12: tshangs spyod pa la sogs pa yis //
T05TD4018E:259b-13: ci phyir lus ni ltung bar byed //
T05TD4018E:259b-14: yang dag shes las de dag grol //
T05TD4018E:259b-15: de dag la ni gzir gyur med //
T05TD4018E:259b-17: de ste mi rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:259b-20: stong pa bsgom pas 'dod chags kyis skyo ba la gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur na ni de'i tshe bdag tu chags pa dang /
T05TD4018E:259b-22: gzhan la gnod pa'i dngos bo med pas ji ltar na rku ba dang /
T05TD4018E:259b-24: gzhan gyi bung med la smrel bar 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:259b-25: srog gcod pa'i sdig pa yang ji ltar na byed /
T05TD4018E:259b-26: 'dod chags kyi skyo ba tshangs par spyod pa yang ji ltar na yang gdung bar byed /
T05TD4018E:259b-27: 'on te de kho na nyid yi ge 'bru de brjod pas na ni der zhugs pas na ci'i phyir na 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:259b-28: bdag tu chags pa las ni 'khor bar sdug bsngal 'byung na chags pa dang ma bral gyi bar du ji ltar na 'grol /
T05TD4018E:259b-29: de'i phyir chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa yongs su shes nas mthar zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas blo ni de lta bu'o //
T05TD4018E:259b-30: mtha' gsum yongs su dag pa'i sha ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo zhes pa ni gang gnang ba yang med la bkag ba yang med de /
T05TD4018E:259b-32: mtha' gsum yongs su dag pa'i sha dkon par gsungs so //
T05TD4018E:259b-33: snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la ni de yang mdo sde 'dir bkag pa ste /
T05TD4018E:259b-34: sngags smra ba rnams la ni sha za rnams kyis bar chad byed cing gnod pa byed pas na khyad par du bkag go //
T05TD4018E:259b-35: rlung la sogs pa'i nad la ni ba mar dang /
T05TD4018E:259b-39: gro la sogs par gyur pa ni gnyen po'o //
T05TD4018E:260a-0: des na btsog pa dang gtsang ba'i sha snying rje can @260a * //
T05TD4018E:260a-2: 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams yang dag par lta ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-5: mi mdzes pa la sogs pa bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam pa thams cad shes pa las gnas pa rnams ji ltar na sha la sogs pa'i ro la mngon par chags par 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:260a-6: btsun gtso byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa dar las g-yogs pa lta bur shes par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag snang ngo //
T05TD4018E:260a-7: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sgrib pa med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te /
T05TD4018E:260a-8: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T05TD4018E:260a-9: de'i dngos po bas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos nyid do //
T05TD4018E:260a-10: snang ba dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-11: snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa rnams kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-12: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-13: las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir de dag la bkres pa ga la zhig ste /
T05TD4018E:260a-14: 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa la gnas pa rnams lta bur ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du 'tsho ba'i dbang po dus thams cad du gnas so //
T05TD4018E:260a-15: mchog tu yongs su dag pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thams cad mkhyen cing gzugs sna tshogs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang po ting nge 'dzin gyi ro bdud rtsis 'tsho ba de dag la rnying pa mi mdzes pa'i sha la sogs pa'i ro myang bar ga las na 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:260a-16: sems can thams cad rgyud rangs par mdzad pa /
T05TD4018E:260a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por thabs sna tshogs can byang chub sems kyi sems rgyu spangs pa rtag pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-19: gnyis su med pa'i chos thabs sna tshogs kyis ston pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-20: don dam pa dngos po dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-22: yid bzhin gyi nor bu yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-23: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyu dang 'bras bur byung ba dang /
T05TD4018E:260a-25: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yon tan mang du 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4018E:260b-0: sems kyi tshogs khyad par can dang dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung la mnga' ba la sogs @260b pa'i yon tan can dang /
T05TD4018E:260b-2: ye shes dpal bzang pos chud pa'i mun pa chen po mtha' dag bcom ste /
T05TD4018E:260b-3: rab tu snang bar byas pa dang /
T05TD4018E:260b-4: rab rib dang ling tog bcom ste nyi ma'i yon tan gyis 'jig rten mtha' dag snang bar mdzad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa rnams te /
T05TD4018E:260b-5: mchog tu yongs su dag cing /
T05TD4018E:260b-6: 'dod chags dang bral ba thams cad mkhyen cing rnal 'byor gyi dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su skyob par zhugs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:260b-7: mchod sbyin pa kha cig ni rang byung rang nyid kyis mchod sbyin gyi don du lugs byas so zhes rtog pa de 'dir dpyad par bya ste /
T05TD4018E:260b-8: gal te de 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig na ni rtsed mo'i phyir bya ste /
T05TD4018E:260b-9: gzhan la sdug bsngal bar byed pa de la ci mkho //
T05TD4018E:260b-10: 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid yin na ni nang gi 'dod pas bslad de rnam pa mang por sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de'i mi shes pa yang sus byas /
T05TD4018E:260b-11: des na ci yang sus kyang mi byed de /
T05TD4018E:260b-12: gser gyi 'byung gnas bzhin du sems can rnams kyi chud pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T05TD4018E:260b-13: ji lta bur zhe na ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyun gyi dbang dang /
T05TD4018E:260b-14: mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i ma rig ba ni gnyis kyi rnam pa glo bur du byung ba'i dri ma dang bral na dag ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:260b-15: bsam pa dag pa de dag ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal yongs su skyob cing mi 'jigs pa sbyin par thams cad du zhugs pa'o //
T05TD4018E:260b-16: de dag gis bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis ro'i sred pa thams cad yongs su spong na sems can la gnod par 'gyur pa'i sha za ba'i ro la chags par 'gyur ba lta zhig ci smos /
T05TD4018E:260b-17: kha zas ni sman bzhin du bza'i rgyags shing rlom pa'i phyir na ma yin te /
T05TD4018E:260b-18: mkhas pa rnams la gang ni sdig pa med pa rnams de lta bu ni lus gso ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir rung ngo //
T05TD4018E:260b-19: nan tan can rnams la ni bye brag tu ste /
T05TD4018E:261a-0: slong ba'i zas su gang ltung zhing khyim bdag gis byin pa ni 'bras chan bzhin du de @261a * //
T05TD4018E:261a-1: dag gi zas gtso yin te /
T05TD4018E:261a-2: ci 'dis dbang po bzhin du gzhan la gnod par byas te zas rnyed dam /
T05TD4018E:261a-3: 'on te ci bdag nyid kyis ji lta bu zhig tu 'byung ngam zhes rnam par mi brtag par blangs la nan tan pa rnams 'byung ste 'gro'o //
T05TD4018E:261a-4: brgyud pa las sdig par 'gyur du zin na ni 'gron pa la yang sdig par 'gyur te /
T05TD4018E:261a-5: gal te 'gron po lam du mi 'gro na ni mi rgod la ma byin par blang bar ji ltar na 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:261a-6: gal te ma bskyed na ni ji ltar na gsod par 'gyur /
T05TD4018E:261a-7: des na pha ma la yang sdig par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4018E:261a-8: de lta bas na bsam pa yongs su dag pas gzhan la phan par zhugs te /
T05TD4018E:261a-9: slong ba bslangs na thams cad du bsod nams yod de /
T05TD4018E:261a-10: gnyis kyi rnam par bsod nams so //
T05TD4018E:261a-11: de de ltar thams cad mkhyen pas gzhan la gnod pa la ltos te sha za ba dang sha za bar bskul pa la ni sdig par gsungs so //
T05TD4018E:261a-12: mtha' gsum bkag par gyur pa las sdig pa mi bya ste /
T05TD4018E:261a-13: mtha' gsum yongs su dag pa ni bdag gis ma bsad /
T05TD4018E:261a-14: gsod du ma bcug / ltos pa yang med pa ste /
T05TD4018E:261a-15: rnam pa de ltar 'bras chan lta bur slong ba'i zas ma bslangs pa ma bsams par byin pa ni yongs su dag pa ste /
T05TD4018E:261a-16: sman lta bur shis pa'i zas so //
T05TD4018E:261a-17: snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la de yang bkag pa'o //
T05TD4018E:261a-18: sngags mkhan la ni khyad par du ste /
T05TD4018E:261a-19: sems can mgu bar bya ba dang /
T05TD4018E:261a-20: lha mngon par dang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4018E:261a-21: de'i phyir yul thams cad kyi ro myang bar chags pa yongs su spangs na mthar ro //
T05TD4018E:261a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub skye bo la //
T05TD4018E:261a-23: gdon za med par bdar ba yin //
T05TD4018E:261a-24: gser bzhin du ni bzhag pa ste //
T05TD4018E:261a-25: mngon sum rjes su dpag pa yi //
T05TD4018E:261a-26: gnyis su 'gro ba'i yul gyis su //
T05TD4018E:261a-27: shes rab kyis ni gnyis med 'grub //
T05TD4018E:261a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi blo rgyas pas //
T05TD4018E:261a-29: rtsod pa du mar rab phye ste //
T05TD4018E:261a-30: yang dag chos ni bshad pa ni //
T05TD4018E:261a-31: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa yi //
T05TD4018E:261a-32: ye shes dpal bzang bya bas ni //
T05TD4018E:261a-33: lang kar gshegs par shes par bya'o //
T05TD4018E:261a-34: shes rab gang ni pha rol phyin //
T05TD4018E:261a-35: rab tu rnam par rgyas pa'i yul //
T05TD4018E:261b-0: gnyis kyi tshul gyis rab @261b rgyas pa //
T05TD4018E:261b-1: gnyis med rigs par zhugs pa de //
T05TD4018E:261b-2: lang kar gsungs dang dgongs tshul gyis //
T05TD4018E:261b-3: bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba ni //
T05TD4018E:261b-4: phung por gnas pa rnam par 'jig / mgo yung rab rib mtshungs par nod //
T05TD4018E:261b-5: de ni zhi ba rab bzhi ste //
T05TD4018E:261b-6: sbom po phyogs kyi chas stong pa //
T05TD4018E:261b-7: nam mkha' me tog bzhin du ste //
T05TD4018E:261b-8: ma skyes pa yang rtag pa med //
T05TD4018E:261b-9: ji 'dra don ni 'dra ba dag / gzhan gyi dbang ni smon lam gyis //
T05TD4018E:261b-10: ji ltar bya zhes sems khong chud //
T05TD4018E:261b-11: klu 'phags sogs pa mkhas pa rnams //
T05TD4018E:261b-12: tshe ring ba yang rnyed pa'i rnams //
T05TD4018E:261b-13: 'gro ba la ni phyir phyogs te //
T05TD4018E:261b-14: rtsod pa du mar brjod pa yi //
T05TD4018E:261b-15: bdag dang gzhan gyi blo rgyas pa //
T05TD4018E:261b-16: dpag tu med par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4018E:261b-17: kun mkhyen mkhyen pas rtogs pa dang //
T05TD4018E:261b-18: bde gshegs dam pa'i sras rnams kyi //
T05TD4018E:261b-19: tshul ni yang dag bsam ston gyi //
T05TD4018E:261b-20: mdo sde rin chen 'byung gnas ni //
T05TD4018E:261b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs thul glang gis //
T05TD4018E:261b-22: rab tu glongs pa'i rgya mtsho yi //
T05TD4018E:261b-23: bar nas ye shes dpal bzang po //
T05TD4018E:261b-24: log pa'i smon lam gzhan dbang gis //
T05TD4018E:261b-25: ngas ni ji ltar bya snyam nas //
T05TD4018E:261b-26: gzhan la phan pa'i snying rje dang //
T05TD4018E:261b-27: bsod nams 'gas ni pha rol du //
T05TD4018E:261b-29: ye shes dpal bzang de ltar ni //
T05TD4018E:261b-30: snying rje dang ni shes rab kyang //
T05TD4018E:261b-31: rab tu yangs pas gzhan la phan //
T05TD4018E:261b-32: 'dir ni bdag gis gang bshad pa //
T05TD4018E:261b-33: rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi gtsug lag dang //
T05TD4018E:261b-34: tshig tshul tshangs par smra la sogs //
T05TD4018E:261b-35: bdag dang gzhan gyi blo rgyas pa'o //
T05TD4018E:261b-36: grub mtha'i khyad par ma bshad do //
T05TD4018E:261b-37: 'dir bshad pa yi chos rnams dbang //
T05TD4018E:261b-38: gzhan du bshad pa med pa ste //
T05TD4018E:261b-39: rgyal po la yang brten pa med //
T05TD4018E:261b-40: ye shes dpal ni bzang po zhes //
T05TD4018E:261b-41: bya bas 'dus pa brgyad pa las //
T05TD4018E:261b-42: ston pa'i don ni byas pa'o //
T05TD4018E:261b-43: gang sngon 'phags pa klus bos dang //
T05TD4018E:261b-44: lha dang phyogs klu sa dbang po //
T05TD4018E:261b-45: mdo 'di mkhas pas ma bshad pa //
T05TD4018E:261b-46: sgra mkhas rigs pas bsod nams ni //
T05TD4018E:261b-47: der gang bdag gi thub pa mkhyen //
T05TD4018E:261b-48: log pa'i rtog pas bstan pa dkrugs pa la //
T05TD4018E:262a-0: bdag gzhan sma rtsod bdag gis shes @262a * //
T05TD4018E:262a-2: gdon za med pa 'di ni tshul can sbyar //
T05TD4018E:262a-3: skye bo bsod nams nga yis kun mkhyen shog /
T05TD4018E:262a-4: log pa'i rtog pa chud bya bar //
T05TD4018E:262a-5: smon log nga yis ci dgos te //
T05TD4018E:262a-6: dam chos gang ni gdon mi za //
T05TD4018E:262a-8: dam pa'i chos ston mdzad pa 'di'i //
T05TD4018E:262a-9: brtse bas rnam par bshad pa byas //
T05TD4018E:262a-10: bdag gzhan la yang rmongs pa la //
T05TD4018E:262a-11: mang du thos pas bshad par 'gyur //
T05TD4018E:262a-12: cung zad ngan du spyan pa ni //
T05TD4018E:262a-13: kun du 'tsho bas ma sbyangs pa //
T05TD4018E:262a-14: bdag gi don dang gzhan don du //
T05TD4018E:262a-15: bstan pa'i don la rnam ltos te //
T05TD4018E:262a-16: bdag dang gzhan smra don mang pos //
T05TD4018E:262a-17: ye shes dpal bzang dge slong gis //
T05TD4018E:262a-18: dam chos nges par bshad pa'i phyir //
T05TD4018E:262a-19: de ltar sgrib pa zad par 'gyur //
T05TD4018E:262a-20: rab rib skyes pa bdag la ni //
T05TD4018E:262a-21: bri ba gsol ba btab dag la //
T05TD4018E:262a-22: byang chub bla med de thob ste //
T05TD4018E:262a-23: thog ma nyid du de rtogs bya //
T05TD4018E:262a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'grel pa lang kar gshegs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las don dam yang dag 'phags kyis yongs su gsol ba'i 'og tu bshad pa 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
T05TD4018E:262a-26: sha'i dpyad pa'i gong du'am 'og tu 'brel te /
T05TD4018E:262a-27: blos gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab ste /
T05TD4018E:262a-28: bcom ldan 'das la yang gsol ba zhes gnag gis de ltar klog pas na snga ma'i le'u der rtogs par brtag go //
T05TD4018E:262a-29: de la mtshon nas brjod pa'i gnas mang zhing de bzhin gshegs par lung ston pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad nyid las 'byung ngo //
T05TD4018E:262a-30: gang de dag gis chos bshad phyir //
T05TD4018E:262a-31: ji zhig las kyang yul 'khrul te //
T05TD4018E:262a-32: sems kyis sdig pa skyes gyur pa //
T05TD4018E:262a-33: mchod sbyin du mas zhi gnas gyur //
T05TD4018E:262a-34: sdug bsngal mi mdzes tshogs dang rmi bzhin du //
T05TD4018E:262a-35: stong par 'jig rten rnam par shes nas ni //
T05TD4018E:262a-36: ye shes dpal bzang pos ni rnal 'byor du //
T05TD4018E:262a-37: 'jig rten thams cad shes rab snying rjer gyur //
T05TD4018E:262a-38: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa slo dpon ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba rdzogs so /
